attributes.action: stop camalot from running the nation lottery and let Sir Richard Branson run it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Camalot and its share holders make a futune out of us for thr running of the lottery, so its time to let Sir Richard Branson run it, where I beleive he wont make money out of it and more money will go to good couses

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
